description.translate: With unfailing fidelity, let your master's voice be your strength.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Galön le servant\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7D'une fidélité infaillible, laisse la\"}","{\"text\":\"§7voix de ton maître faire ta force.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7With unfailing fidelity, let your\"}","{\"text\":\"§7master's voice be your strength.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a3 §7HER§a1\"}"]}}
